availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas E. Henderson (Trigg County, KY, farmer)

body.p: Trigg County, Kentucky, farmer. Shelby County, Tennessee native. Son of Bennett Henderson and Catherine Henderson. Farmer in Trigg County in 1850. Served in the 3rd Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment as a private from August 14, 1863 to December 24, 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trigg County, District 1, 317B.
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 0029 and Roll 0474.
